General.Name: DB Financial Investment Co Ltd
General.Description: DB Financial Investment Co., Ltd. provides various financial products and services in South Korea. It engages in the provision of asset management, insurance, life, savings bank, brokerage, bond dealing, IB, investment trust, international business, mid to long-term investment, stocks, derivatives, asset trading, tax and law, and risk management services. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
